actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for the continued operation of the Public Health Service hospitals.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to continue operation of Public Health Service hospitals located in Seattle, Washington; Boston, Massachusetts; San Francisco, California; Galveston, Texas; New Orleans, Louisiana; Baltimore, Maryland; Staten Island, New York; and Norforlk, Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the continued operation of the Public Health Service hospitals.
